list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The soldiers resisted the enemy attack

list_definition.definition: to be able to stop oneself doing, taking etc (something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I couldn’t resist kicking him when he bent down

list_definition.definition: to be unaffected or undamaged by

list_ex_of_english: Students considered it too hard, and many instructors resisted teaching a subject which they themselves had not mastered.

There is other language usage in broadcasting which is resisted by listeners but permissible in informal speech.
